start_message_private: Hello %s — I'm %s, a bot with some useful and fun commands for you. SourceCode: GitHub
start_message_group: Hello, I'm %s I have a lot of cool features. To find out more, click on the button below and start a conversation with me.
help_menu_message: Here are all my plugins. To find out more about the plugins, just click on their name.
config_menu_message: Settings — Here are my settings for this group, to know more, click on the buttons below.
language_menu_mesage: Current language: %s %s Select below the language you want to use the bot.
language_changed_successfully: The language has been changed successfully.

afk.name: AFK
afk.help: AFK stands for: “away from keyboard” It is basically Internet slang to say that you are away. /afk (motivo) — Define yourself as away.

medias.name: Medias
medias.config: Medias settings To know more about the medias module, use /help in my private chat.
